item.title: Classic Lasagna
item.description: You might need a bit more cottage or ricotta cheese, especially if splitting between smaller pans. Also, you will only get two levels deep if you don’t have a really deep pan. Our contribution to this recipe comes from Ashley’s mother, which is adding a package of spicy Italian sausage to give some additional flavor.

item.title: Red Berry Tart
item.description: A favorite when I go to BBQs (parties, hackathons, your folks’ place), this red berry tart is fairly easy to make and packs a huge wow factor.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: Graham Cracker Crust
item.description: A simple graham cracker crust, perfect for cheesecakes or tarts.

item.title: Red Berry Dessert Topping
item.description: A simple mash of berries, perfect for a tart or top of cheesecake.

item.title: Vanilla Custard Filling
item.description: A simple vanilla custard filling, useful for tarts (or alone by itself in a bowl).
